# Release Notes - v0.2.0

**Release Date**: 2026-02-18  
**Type**: Minor Release (Consolidation & Automation)  
**Source**: Project Evolution (TCC_V2 Harvest + Refinements)

## ğŸ¯ Highlights

This release expands Data-Pro-Skill capabilities beyond survey analysis, introducing a high-performance **Time-Series Analysis** suite and an advanced **Clustering Toolkit**. Additionally, it introduces automated document refactoring and standardized academic knowledge.

### ğŸ’ Key Additions

#### New Capabilities
- **Time-Series Analysis**: A complete backend for strategy validation, walk-forward testing, and resource distribution simulation.
- **Clustering Toolkit**: Deterministic PCA+DBSCAN grouping with built-in quality diagnostics (Giant Cluster Ratio) and stability metrics.
- **Documentation Excellence**: Integrated academic persona (Thesis Defense Critic) and CRISP-DM for research into the shared `@document-mastery` skill.

#### Enhanced Skills & Automation
- **data-viz**: Added support for performance curves and drawdown visualization.
- **context-optimizer**: New semantic grouping logic (`group_sections.py`) for automated document refactoring into `.agent/` structures.

#### Performance & Resilience
- **Smart Grid Search**: New rule for pre-filtering candidates (up to 22x faster) and a checkpoint workflow for resilient long-running tasks.
